SELECT itm.id as itemid,g.id AS goodsid,itm.is_selected,g.goods_name,g.goodsno,g.price,
gp.price as wap_price,
g.abbreviation_picture as imageurl,g.spec,itm.quantity,IFNULL(p.id,0) AS promid, p.advertise FROM t_cart_item itm LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON itm.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_promotion p ON g.`promotion_id`=p.id
LEFT JOIN t_goods_price gp ON gp.`goods_id` = g.`id` and gp.price_type='wap' AND gp.platform_type='111yao'
WHERE itm.cart_id = ( SELECT id FROM t_cart cart WHERE
cart.cart_key = #uuid:varchar#
cart.member_id = #userid:decimal#
)

gp.price as wap_price, gp.price as pc_price, cat.categoryid,g.stock FROM t_cart_item c LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON g.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_promotion p ON g.`promotion_id`=p.id LEFT JOIN t_category_goods cat ON g.id = cat.goodsid AND cat.type=2 LEFT JOIN t_goods_price gp ON gp.`goods_id` = g.`id` and gp.price_type='wap' AND gp.platform_type='111yao'

SELECT SUM(gp.price) as money FROM t_prom_item t LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON t.target_id=g.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_price gp ON gp.`goods_id` = g.`id` and gp.price_type='wap' AND gp.platform_type='111yao'
WHERE t.target_id IN($goods$) AND t.pid = #prom:decimal# GROUP BY t.pid

SELECT t.goods_name,
gp.price as pc_price,
img.`image_url`,t.price FROM t_goods t LEFT JOIN t_goods_images img ON t.id = img.goodsid AND isdefault=1 LEFT JOIN t_goods_price gp ON gp.`goods_id` = t.`id` and gp.price_type='wap' AND gp.platform_type='111yao'
WHERE t.id IN ( SELECT goodsid FROM t_category_goods WHERE categoryid IN ( SELECT categoryid FROM t_category_goods WHERE goodsid IN ( SELECT goods_id FROM t_cart_item WHERE cart_id = 1 ) ) )
